group_1.textLeft: Oh, hello Alina.
You just missed Tsukuyo and Tsukasa.

group_1.textRight: I see. Not that it matters in the slightest.

group_1.textLeft: Speaking of them... The rumor of the@Christmas Death Caribou...
It's made it all the way to Tsukasa by the@sound of it.

group_1.textRight: Has it...?
Have I, Alina, been found out?

group_1.textLeft: No...

group_1.textRight: Then it's of no concern.
Those flute sisters are White Wings. It@shouldn't be a problem if they find out.
I just don't want too many people to know,@it will make it harder for me to do this.

group_1.textLeft: You're taking this better than I thought...
With you being behind this whole Christmas@Death Caribou rumor...
I thought you'd be more irritated at least.

group_1.textRight: I'm not as calm as you think.

group_1.textLeft: You're not?

group_1.textRight: I've fused with the Fur God several times...
But I have yet to take life from anyone I've@found.
For some reason there's always some kind@of interference.

group_1.textLeft: Any idea why?

group_1.textRight: Hmmm...

group_1.narration: First off, I sense a target whose@heart has frozen beyond the brink.
Then cheerful bells sound when I transform.
And a card just appears in my hand.

group_1.textRight: I throw that card at the target...
And make my appearance. That's how it@plays out.

group_1.textLeft: You hear the bells go off...and a card just@shows up in your hand?

group_1.textRight: Yes, on its own.

group_1.textLeft: So it's the Uwasa's magic that creates@the cards.
I thought it wasn't like you to prepare props@like that.
But now I understand.

group_1.textRight: It's not like me?
Now that you mention it...
I, Alina, had never once questioned throwing@the card until this moment.
To tell the truth, the entire act is@unnatural for me to perform.
I don't even remember what I say after I @do it.

group_1.textLeft: So those bells are some kind of trigger...
And the Uwasa takes over from that point,@correct?

group_1.textRight: Hmmm...
Yes, that would fit with Uwasa as we@understand them.
But the true problem lies in what occurs@afterwards.

group_1.textLeft: Is this about everyone suddenly becoming@happy after the encounter for some reason?

group_1.textRight: Sì.
What the Fur God Uwasa should be@doing is...

group_1.textLeft: Yes...
It warms the frozen heart of its target in@exchange for a few years off their life.

group_1.textRight: Yet that never comes to pass...
Maybe I'm just doing it wrong.

group_1.textLeft: (I'd prefer it stayed this way...)
(I would love for Alina to keep bringing joy@and happiness to all she meets.)

group_1.textRight: Anyway, I must be off.

group_1.textLeft: Where to?

group_1.textRight: Namiki Street.
Masses will gather to view the Christmas@lights.
Perfect for locating targets.

group_1.textCenter: I'm about to go assist my father...
There'll be an event at Namiki Street.
As long as it finishes up when it's supposed@to, I should make it in the nick of time!
Think there's a chance we'll see her on the@way to the Christmas party?
(Tsukasa, you very well might run into@Alina tonight.)
